translation.en: [panting] I'm on the surface. I'm on the surface.
[yells] The sun!
I looked at the sun! I'll go blind!
translation.zh: 我看见太阳了！我要瞎了！

translation.en: Wait, I can still see.
[exclaims] I can't be here. I can't be here. I can't be here.
Out of my way, rocks!
Dad! Can you hear me?
[sighs] Of course not. He could be miles away.
translation.zh: 当然听不见 他可能在十万八千里之外

translation.en: OK. [inhales sharply] You can do this, Kipo.
translation.zh: 好吧 你行的 姬波

translation.en: You got this.
Humans lived on the surface for thousands of years.
translation.zh: 人类曾经在地表生活过好几千年

translation.en: You can handle a few minutes up here.
translation.zh: 上来待个几分钟不成问题的

translation.en: You just have to find your way home.
translation.zh: 只要找到回家的路就行了

translation.en: Flowers.
A lot bigger than they are in books.
translation.zh: 比书上看到的大了许多

translation.en: ♪ Up on top, on my own ♪
translation.zh: 茕茕孑立 独处地面

translation.en: ♪ A human girl so far from home ♪
translation.zh: 人类女孩 离家甚远

translation.en: ♪ The flowers are big ♪
♪ The bees are weird ♪
♪ It's dangerous ♪
♪ Just like I feared ♪
♪ On the surface world ♪
Stay away!
Hmm... Let's see, the current took me left, then right.
translation.zh: 回想一下 水流先往左 再往右

translation.en: And then there was the long part.
[stammering] And the... And the short part.
And then the loop-dee-do.
And then I went way over here, so, my home must be in this direction.
translation.zh: 最后我跑到这上头来 由此可见 我家一定在这个方向

translation.en: Or was it left, then loop-dee-do?
translation.zh: 还是先往左再接螺旋渠道？

translation.en: Or... or... loop-dee-do, then left?
translation.zh: 还是…先螺旋渠道再往左？

translation.en: [gasps] Who are you, little one?
You're adorable.
Uh, sorry.
Didn't expect you to come with extra eyes.
translation.zh: 我没料到你还有别的眼睛

translation.en: I'm a friend.
Oh! You come with an extra pair of everything!
I only have two legs. So boring.
translation.zh: 我只有两条腿 真没意思

translation.en: -I have to pet you. -[squealing]
[Kipo] Wait! Come back!
You can run, pig. But I will find you, and I will pet you.
translation.zh: 小猪 你尽管跑吧 反正我一定会找到你 然后摸摸你的

translation.en: I somehow feel like I've been wearing you my whole life.
translation.zh: 这简直就是我的衣服嘛

translation.en: Piggy!
I can help you with that.
We have vending machines like this in my burrow.
translation.zh: 我们地穴也有类似这样的贩卖机

translation.en: I know all the tricks.
There's a wire back here.
If I could just get to it.
translation.zh: 只要我能找到电线就行

translation.en: That works, too.
Whoa! You were hungry, weren't you?
Hey, wanna try something fun?
You ready?
Yeah!
Humans from the old world.
This is a school!
I go to school, too.
Underground with lots of other kids.
translation.zh: 我和许多小朋友在地底上学

translation.en: No windows, though. My father teaches there.
translation.zh: 只不过没有窗户 我父亲是学校老师

translation.en: "Kipo, how many light years are in a parsec?"
translation.zh: “姬波 一秒差距是几光年？”

translation.en: Although, a lot of good that does me up here.
translation.zh: 可是我在地表上根本用不到这些知识

translation.en: My whole life they taught us the surface was this horrible place.
translation.zh: 学校从小就教导我们 地表是很可怕的地方

translation.en: -But look at you. -[snorting]
You look just like these dumplings my dad makes.
translation.zh: 你看上去就像我爸包的那些饺子

translation.en: They're called "mandu."
translation.zh: 不过念起来比较像“馒头”

translation.en: [gasps] That's it! I'm gonna call you "Mandu."
I'm gonna get you!
-[squealing] -I'm gonna get you, Mandu!
Mandu, I have to pet this bunny, now.
translation.zh: 馒头 我要去摸摸那只兔子

translation.en: It's gonna be OK.
Hi, there. Aren't you fluffy.
translation.zh: 你好啊 瞧你毛茸茸的

translation.en: Oh, you like that.
Oh! There's another one.
OK, OK! Everyone wait your turn.
You're all so soft, but there's only one of me.
translation.zh: 你们都软绵绵的 但我分身乏术啦

translation.en: And that must be the mother.
Mandu!
Mandu!
Can you talk, mute?
translation.zh: 变种怪 你会说话吗？

translation.en: I'm no barbarian. If a mute can talk, it's not chow.
translation.zh: 我不是野蛮人 会说话的变种怪 我就不吃了

translation.en: All I need to hear is one little "yes."
translation.zh: 我只需要听到你开口说“会”

translation.en: -[squeals] -A human?
Sorry, but a girl's gotta eat.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但我总得填饱肚子

translation.en: Wait! [grunts]
I was wondering when you were gonna come out of there.
translation.zh: 我还在想你什么时候会现身

translation.en: You're human! On the surface.
You don't miss a thing, do you?
-[Mandu squealing] -[gasps] Wait. You can't eat my friend.
translation.zh: 慢着 你不能把我朋友吃掉

translation.en: If you want a bacon sandwich, go catch your own pig.
translation.zh: 你想吃培根三明治的话 就自己去抓一头猪

translation.en: I already called dibs on this one.
-Mandu is no sandwich! -She's about to be.
translation.zh: -馒头才不是三明治！ -它即将成为三明治了

translation.en: [gasps] Say, your staff is so pointy.
translation.zh: 哇 你的棒子好刺喔

translation.en: -Where'd you get it from? -Off a giant scorpion.
translation.zh: -这你从哪弄来的？ -一只巨大的蝎子身上

translation.en: It was trespassing in my camp.
-[squealing] -Oh, no, you don't!
-Hey! Run, Mandu! -Let go!
What is wrong with you?
Now we're both out of a meal.
translation.zh: 现在我们都没东西吃了

translation.en: How can you eat her? She's adorable!
translation.zh: 你怎么忍心吃它？它那么可爱！

translation.en: I've eaten plenty of adorable.
And there's lots more adorable that's tried to eat me.
translation.zh: 而且还有更可爱的东西想吃我

translation.en: Do you have any hand sanitizer?
You must not be from around here.
Are you one of those underground mole people?
You've heard of us!
I didn't think there were any humans left up here anymore.
translation.zh: 我还以为地表上已经没有任何人类了

translation.en: For your lost lunch.
Listen, I'm trying to find my way home.
translation.zh: 听着 我想找到回家的路

translation.en: You clearly look like you grew up around here.
translation.zh: 看样子你从小就在这里长大

translation.en: Maybe you could help me find...
it.
[grunting] Kipo. My name's Kipo.
And... and I really need your help right now.
You're not gone? That's annoying.
Look, there was a mute-quake.
translation.zh: 听着 之前有变种怪造成地震

translation.en: A lot of people I care about could be hurt.
translation.zh: 有许多我在乎的人可能受伤了

translation.en: I really need to get home.
Not my problem.
First lesson of the surface: Up here, you don't shout like that.
translation.zh: 地表生存第一课 在这里 不能大声吼叫

translation.en: It's called "ringing the dinner bell."
Free advice.
Hey, you, wolf girl!
Yeah! You, walking away from me!
translation.zh: 就是说你！竟然就这样走掉！

translation.en: I'm still talking to you!
Fine. I don't need you anyway.
translation.zh: 算了 反正我也不需要你

translation.en: Oh, hi. You look friendly.
translation.zh: 你好 你好像挺友善的

translation.en: That's your last freebie.
translation.zh: 这是我最后一次出手相助了

translation.en: Fine. I'll just go this way instead.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就走这边

translation.en: Really? You're just gonna walk right into Death Ivy?
translation.zh: 真的假的？ 你要大摇大摆走入死亡之藤中？

translation.en: [groans] You're not gonna last five minutes.
translation.zh: 你在这里撑不过五分钟

translation.en: Look, I'll help you get home.
translation.zh: 听着 我会帮助你回家

translation.en: But once you're back, I'm out.
translation.zh: 一旦你回家 我就闪人了

translation.en: -Up here, I work alone. Got it? -Oh, thank you!
translation.zh: -我在地表一向独来独往 听懂没？ -谢谢你！

translation.en: No hugging.
I knew you were a good person.
Hey, I just realized I don't know your name.
translation.zh: 对了 我还不知道你的名字

translation.en: -No talking! -Uh, OK.
translation.zh: 不准说话！ 好吧 那我就叫你小狼吧

translation.en: I'll just call you "Wolf", then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我就叫你小狼吧

translation.en: I've already been calling you that in my head.
translation.zh: 我在心里已经默默这么叫你了

translation.en: At first we thought it was a mute passing overhead.
translation.zh: 我们一开始以为是变种怪从头上经过

translation.en: I mean, that happens all the time, right?
We learned a long time ago to anchor all tall furniture.
translation.zh: 我们很久以前就学会 要把大型家具固定住

translation.en: But this one was, like, an earthquake. I can't imagine how big it was.
translation.zh: 但这一次很像是地牛翻身 真难想象到底是多大只的变种怪

translation.en: It made an entire cliff fall... while I was on it.
translation.zh: 整个峭壁都被震落了… 我本来站在上面

translation.en: And then, I landed in the water supply tube and nearly drowned.
translation.zh: 然后我掉进供水管 差点淹死

translation.en: [gulps] Sounds like a Tuesday.
Listen, Kipo, was it?
translation.zh: 听着 你叫姬波 对吧？

translation.en: Lesson two of the surface: Don't ever tell anyone that story.
translation.zh: 地表生存第二课 不要再和别人说这件事了

translation.en: It could be very dangerous if people know you're from a burrow.
translation.zh: 如果被人知道你来自地穴 可能会非常危险

translation.en: And lesson three of the surface: Up here, you never pass up a meal.
translation.zh: 地表生存第三课 在这里 有东西吃就必须吃

translation.en: Crispy on the outside, chewy in the center.
Can you tell me anything about your burrow that might help us find it?
translation.zh: 你的地穴有什么特征 是有助于我们找到的？

translation.en: Oh, well, there's the underground irrigation system...
which is underground.
[gasps] Oh, wait! The Clover!
How could I forget the Clover?
translation.zh: 我怎么把幸运草给忘了？

translation.en: We live under this barrier called The Great Clover.
translation.zh: 我们生活在 巨无霸幸运草屏障的保护之下

translation.en: I've never actually seen it, but we use it as our city emblem.
translation.zh: 我从未亲眼瞧见过 不过这是我们的市徽图案

translation.en: Hmm. I may know what that is.
translation.zh: 我好像知道那是什么了

translation.en: We'll make camp here for the night.
translation.zh: 我们要在这里扎营过夜

translation.en: For the night... out here?
Uh, my dad must be really worried about me right now, so...
translation.zh: 我爸现在肯定超级担心我 所以…

translation.en: Uh, did you hear that? Because I definitely did.
translation.zh: 你听见了吗？因为我可听见了

translation.en: It feels like something we should worry about.
So many sparkles! I was not prepared.
translation.zh: 好多晶晶亮！出乎我意料之外

translation.en: Why would humans stay underground
translation.zh: 每晚抬头就能看见星空

translation.en: when every night they could look up and see this?
translation.zh: 人类为什么还要住在地底呢？

translation.en: Yeah, it's a real paradise.
translation.zh: 是啊 这里真是美好乐园呢

translation.en: That must be the Big Dipper! It's part of Ursa Major.
translation.zh: 那一定是北斗七星！ 是大熊座的一部分

translation.en: I'm kind of an astronomy buff even though I've never seen a sky before.
translation.zh: 我算是天文迷 虽然我之前从没看过天空

translation.en: Ooh! And that bright one, that's Polaris!
translation.zh: 那颗明亮的星星是北极星！

translation.en: You see the one that doesn't make any noise?
translation.zh: 你看到默不作声的了吗？

translation.en: Well, none of them make... Oh.
[chuckles nervously] OK. I'll be quiet.
You get sleep.
[gasps] Aries! That's my birth sign.
I've always wanted to see it!
It's supposed to be a ram if you connect the dots.
translation.zh: 把所有闪亮点连起来 就会是公羊的形状

translation.en: I guess you can kinda see it if you squint right--
translation.zh: 瞇瞇眼的话 应该可以看得出来…

translation.en: -[Wolf] Kipo! -Oh, right.
Anything that looks useful, take.
translation.zh: 看上去有用的东西就拿

translation.en: "October 23rd, 2020."
Yeah, it's expired by about 200 years.
translation.zh: 对 已经过期将近两百年了

translation.en: -Found it! -Spot remover?
That's for getting out shirt stains.
No offense, yours may need a full spin cycle.
translation.zh: 我无意冒犯 但你的衣服 得丢洗衣机才洗得干净

translation.en: Mega Bunny.
It's a good thing we're inside-- [yells]
-Whoa! -Definitely a Mega Bunny.
I saw that same Mega Bunny earlier.
translation.zh: 我之前见过这只超巨兔

translation.en: I named her "Rabbecka." The little ones are so cuddly!
translation.zh: 我帮它取名为“兔贝卡” 它的兔宝宝们超级可爱！

translation.en: You touched the babies?
Why did you touch the babies?
Don't you know you can't touch the babies?!
translation.zh: 你不知道不能乱碰宝宝吗？

translation.en: But they were so cute. [yells]
Aisle six, baking goods. Aisle seven, drinks.
translation.zh: 六号走道是烘焙食品 七号走道是饮料

translation.en: Aisle eight, bingo!
Pretty sure you got the baby scent off me.
translation.zh: 我很肯定你已经帮我 去除兔宝宝的气味了

translation.en: You can't be too careful.
Huh? Oh, all out. Oh, thank goodness!
It's a good thing I found this second bottle.
[groans] You've gotta be kidding me!
-[coughing] -This one's Summer Rain.
That is way better than taking the stairs!
If you run into anything, act like you're from the surface.
translation.zh: 万一你碰到任何…“东西” 记得表现得像个地表人

translation.en: From the surface. Got it.
translation.zh: 像个地表人 知道了

translation.en: Uh, what are you doing?
[deep voice] I'm from the surface, where life is hard.
translation.zh: 我是地表人 这里生活不易

translation.en: You gotta be tough as nails.
Iron and fire... wearing dead animals.
translation.zh: 铁石心肠…身上披挂着动物死尸

translation.en: Good. You're catching on.
translation.zh: 很好 你要进入状态了

translation.en: This is my angry surface face.
translation.zh: 这就是我的地表愤怒脸

translation.en: Hmm. [normal voice] Whoa, what's that?
[gasps] There's so much to see when you're not in a cave!
translation.zh: 洞穴之外 处处是惊奇！

translation.en: Focus, Kipo.
[Kipo gasps] That must be it!
It looks just like the clover in our emblem.
translation.zh: 那里看上去就是我们市徽的幸运草

translation.en: Wow. So, that's my home.
It's half a day's walk from here,
but we'll have to get over Skyscraper Ridge.
translation.zh: 但我们必须越过摩天大岭

translation.en: -[Kipo] That looks dangerous. -[Wolf] It is.
I'm really sticking my neck out for you. And for what?
translation.zh: 我到底何必为了你以身涉险？

translation.en: I wish I knew how to repay you.
Or if you wanted to come stay with me,
translation.zh: 或是改天你想来跟我住的话

translation.en: I'm sure there'd be a place for you in my burrow.
translation.zh: 我的地穴一定替你保留一个位置

translation.en: And go all soft and mushy like the rest of you mole people?
translation.zh: 然后像你们地穴人一样 变得软弱可欺吗？

translation.en: No, thanks.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢你的好意

translation.en: Humans.
[gasps] My shirt!
[pants] It won't come out!
[groaning] It's setting!
[panting] Careful! That's one of the Mod Frogs.
You do not wanna mess with them.
You're a talking frog!
I mean, I've seen tons of talking frogs before...
translation.zh: 我早就看过一堆会讲话…

translation.en: that wear suits.
No... No biggie.
What my friend here means to say is, we have this!
translation.zh: 我朋友的意思是…我们有去渍神器！

translation.en: Spot remover! Give it to me!
If you let us go.
[gasps] Look, this is my private office.
translation.zh: 听着 这是我的私人办公室

translation.en: Was there an "enjoy the view" sign on my door?
translation.zh: 门口标示 “欢迎入内观赏风景”了吗？

translation.en: I think not.
We're Mega Bunny hunters. We were just scouting.
translation.zh: 我们是超巨兔猎人 只是来勘察情况的

translation.en: [groans] Just give me the spot remover.
Then I'll decide what to do with you.
translation.zh: 我再来决定该拿你们怎么办

translation.en: [shrieking] Oh, thank... Huh?
Mega Bunny hunters. Right.
translation.zh: 什么超巨兔猎人 鬼才信

translation.en: Looked more like a burrow girl to me.
translation.zh: 依我看比较像是住地穴的小女孩

translation.en: [sighs] This does not get old.
Lesson five on the surface: Looking up... gets you killed.
translation.zh: 地表生存第五课 走路不看路…会有杀身之祸

translation.en: [gasps] Mandu! You came back!
Here, girl!
Something's wrong.
Yeah, you're pointing a nightmare stick at a tiny pig.
translation.zh: 对啊 你拿着一根可怕的棒子 指着一只小猪

translation.en: How do you expect the poor thing to react?
translation.zh: 你觉得那可怜的小家伙该有何反应？

translation.en: I'm not the one who spooked her.
Oh, burrow girl! I figured out where you're from.
translation.zh: 地穴女孩！ 我知道你是从哪儿来的了

translation.en: Shocker... a burrow!
You could lead us to the mother lode of humans.
translation.zh: 你可以带我们找到人类的大本营

translation.en: [frog] Ah, just a pig.
-[gasps] -[frog] Eh, at least now we have a snack.
I won't let them take her.
translation.zh: 我不会让他们抓走小猪

translation.en: And risk our necks for a mute?
translation.zh: 为了变种怪冒生命危险？

translation.en: See, this is why I work alone.
translation.zh: 这就是我为什么一向独来独往

translation.en: If you like to be alone so bad, maybe you should be.
translation.zh: 如果你这么爱当独行侠 那你就去耍孤僻吧

translation.en: Put the pig down right now!
Burrow girl, there you are.
translation.zh: 地穴女孩 你出现了

translation.en: Uh... That pig is a bloodthirsty killer.
-She'll tear you limb from limb. -Mm, yeah. I'll take my chances.
translation.zh: 它会把你大卸八块 我甘冒风险

translation.en: Wolf! You came back!
Yep.
[gasps] Is he dead?
No, but when he wakes up, he'll have a bad headache...
translation.zh: 没有 不过等他醒过来 会头痛欲裂…

translation.en: and possibly some memory loss.
We'll hole up here.
[grunts] Normally, at night, I'd be at home doing my homework.
translation.zh: 晚上我通常都在家里写作业

translation.en: Eating a muffin.
Not running away from homicidal frogs!
translation.zh: 而不是躲避杀人蛙的追杀！

translation.en: [frog] Oh... Oh, my head.
I... Wait a minute, why are you following me?
translation.zh: 我…等一下 你干嘛跟着我？

translation.en: [henchman] Uh, Jamack, we're looking for those humans.
translation.zh: 贾马克 我们在找那些人类

translation.en: [Jamack] Oh, yeah, right. Yeah, just... duh.
Let's... let's get back to that then.
Since we've had our first fight and makeup,
translation.zh: 既然我们第一次吵架和好了

translation.en: that makes us officially sisters.
translation.zh: 现在我们就是好闺蜜了

translation.en: -Don't. -Uh, right.
[gasps] There's a baby here.
Why is there a baby here?
We have to shut that thing up.
translation.zh: 我们必须让那东西闭嘴

translation.en: OK, we really need you to hush, little baby.
translation.zh: 好 小宝宝 拜托你不要哭了

translation.en: I'll put him to sleep.
There's a slight chance this'll kill him.
translation.zh: 机率很低 但这样有可能会杀了他

translation.en: Don't you dare!
A mute? You gotta be kidding me!
It's still a baby!
[Jamack] Check every room!
Do you know any grub nursery rhymes?
